content: this is a summary of a legal case involving a compensation claim the case has reached the court of appeal the parties involved are not mentioned the court has determined that the plaintiff is responsible for 45 of the coowned property and the defendant is responsible for 55 due to their cohabitation the court of appeal has now divided the shares equally with each party receiving 50 the court has also amended certain points in the original decision the court has dismissed the remaining part of the plaintiffs appeal and upheld the order of the court of first instance regarding the costs of the proceedings the court has also dismissed the defendants appeal and upheld the judgment of the court of first instance the court has ordered the parties to bear their own costs for the appeal the court has found that the defendant made a greater financial contribution to the property but the plaintiff made significant contributions through work and taking care of the family the court has determined that the defendants share should be slightly greater due to their financial contribution the court has also found that the property had a higher value due to investments made and the plaintiff was deprived of a certain amount the court has ordered the plaintiff to pay a portion of the value of the property to the second and third defendants both parties have appealed the decision the court of second instance has reversed the decision of the court of first instance and determined that the shares of the coowned property should be 5050 the court has also addressed the claims of procedural violations and determined that the court of first instance handled the evidence correctly the court has upheld the decision of the court of first instance regarding the costs of the proceedings overall the court of second instance has upheld the decision of the court of first instance with some modifications

metadata.CASE_ID: Sodba Višjega sodišča v Celju Cp 172/2021, 13. 5. 2021
